Name: Yashik
About the game: Yashik - it's very simple game with puzzles. You play as a small character who needs to get out of the room.Your task is to find the key card and open the door. You can create platforms under your feet. Platforms can move or throws up you. Use orange platform to jump across obstacles, yellow platform to move further, and green platform to avoid falling. [F] Create a platform [W] Jump [A] Move left [D] Move right [R] Restart level
